metadata.Title: CVE-2019-9942 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: A sandbox information disclosure exists in Twig before 1.38.0 and 2.x before 2.7.0 because, under some circumstances, it is possible to call the __toString() method on an object even if not allowed by the security policy in place.

criterions.comment: php-twig package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.6.2-2').
